summary.Title: Hairdressers, Norway
summary.Presentation:
Cutters is Norway's most innovative and fastest growing hairdressing concept with salons in the whole country.
Are you motivated for new challenges in Norway, and want to be a part

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Cutters is Norway's most innovative and fastest growing hairdressing concept with salons in the whole country.

Are you motivated for new challenges in Norway, and want to be a part of the Cutters family? 

Then you are the one we are looking for: HAIRDRESSERS 

We are always on the lookout for talented hairdresser’s that know how to put visiting guests in the centre of attention. At Cutters we love to give our guests the best possible experience that they can have in our salons.

We are looking for new employees that share our passion about hair combined with high service, who are professional and always give our guests a high focus and a big smile Cutters main focus is to make sure all of our customers feel seen and taken care of when visiting our salons, where eyes for details is one of our core values. We want our customers to feel like the true rockstar they are For those who work in Cutters, it is as much important to offer an effective and quality proof haircut, as well as making customers feel welcome at our Cutters salons and taken care of in the best possible way.

So, if you love to cut hair and love to provide good service, we would love to hear from you – we take care of each other, and our goal is to create the best working environment for our employees.

Professional qualifications

  • Educated in the hairdressing profession
  • Long experience can compensate for the educational requirement
  • Norwegian (or another Scandinavian language) OR English

Personal characteristics

  • Service minded
  • Self-propelled
  • Flexible
  • Reliable and responsibly
  • Efficient and accurate
  • Team oriented
  • Inclusive above other colleagues
  • Passion for the profession

We offer

  • Permanent contracts/ great salary conditions (appr. 30.000 NOK/3000 EURO pr month)
  • In-house career development / opportunities
  • Introduction courses at the Cutters Academy
  • International career opportunities
  • Fixed employment with close follow-up from manager
  • International working environment
  • A good working environment
  • Social events
  • We also offer to help employees finding a place to live

About the employer

Cutters is Norway's most innovative and fastest growing hairdressing concept. Our salons are among the most visited in the whole country and we get a lot of attention from the media and customers. The Cutters concept has grown healthy and organic since it started in 2015, which we take great pride in.

Cutters is more than just about cutting hair; Cutters is a lifestyle and a way of thinking. Our core values are to cut time, cut hair and cut cost which reflects on thinking lean and putting the clients' needs first. Our employees are an extension of our beating heart, which is why we focus on social happenings, employers’ well-being and employer’s personal interest. Some of Cutters biggest upsides is the understanding on how hairdresser's work and thrive in their profession. That is why we have good salary terms and bonuses regulations, no chemicals, and 6 hours shifts to make sure our hairdresser's health is always highly prioritized.

Cutters is an unorthodox way of cutting hair, such as highly focused on innovative solutions and lean approaches being accessible on digital platforms, digital payments and digital communications. The world is constantly changing and at Cutters we embrace everything that has to do with innovation and more sustainable solutions, where technology and tech are the centre of attention. At Cutters we like to take on new challenges, and that's why we always are looking for talented people to join us on our journey.

Working in the North

Have you ever thought about exploring or even living in the beautiful north that surrounds you with rich nature, mountains, and rich countryside. In Cutters we are currently expanding all over Finland, Sweden, and Norway. Our recruitment programs enables you to do just that. We are in the capitals and cities heart of all the countries and the suburban countryside. We also help all our new hairdressers with settling in, no matter if you are on your own or bringing family members with you.

Cutters takes care of its own and understands the challenges with moving into a new country, that is why our onboarding program helps everyone get started and well settled in all over the North.

We welcome candidates from the EU/EEA and those with a working permit for Norway welcome to apply.

Explore and visit us on:

  • www.cutters.no - Instagram @ Cutters - Facebook @ Cutters

Apply through the Cutters website 

https://blimed.cutters.no/jobs/1630619-norway-s-biggest-hairdresser-are-hiring

Last day of publishing: 01.06.2022 (se bort fra ansøgningsfristen andetsteds i dennew annonce)

(from NAV EURES Norway)
